entities.name: Professor Sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is the Herbology teacher who is trying to be heard over the loud raindrops on the greenhouse roof.

entities.name: Angelina Johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is a member of Dumbledore's Army and is relieved that Quidditch practice has been canceled.

entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is looking forward to his first Defense meeting tonight.

entities.name: Katie Bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a member of Dumbledore's Army and needs to be informed about the Defense meeting.

entities.name: Alicia Spinnet
entities.description: Alicia Spinnet is a member of Dumbledore's Army and needs to be informed about the Defense meeting.

entities.name: Dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has made plans that are not always safe.

entities.name: Ba rnabas the Barmy being clubbed by thos e trolls
entities.description: A tapestry depicting Ba rnabas the Barmy being clubbed by thos e trolls is located on the seventh floor.

entities.name: Seventh Floor
entities.description: The seventh floor is where Harry has arranged to meet for his Defense meeting tonight.

entities.name: Pumpkin Juice
entities.description: Pumpkin juice is a drink that Harry is thirsty for.

relationships.description: Harry informs Angelina about the cancellation of Quidditch practice.
Harry asks Angelina to inform Katie about the Defense meeting.
Harry asks Angelina to inform Alicia about the Defense meeting.
Angelina is concerned that Dobby's plans may not be safe.
Hermione is watching Harry as he eats his sausages and mash.
